FullTitle: Variability and significance of parietal and ventral scales in the marine snakes of the genus Lapemis (Serpentes, Hydrophiidae), with comments on the occurance of spiny scales in the genus /  Paul Gritis, Harold K. Voris.

articles.title:
Variability and significance of parietal and 
ventral scales in marine snakes of the genus Lapemis (Serpentes: Hydrophiidae), with comments on the occurrence of spiny scales in the genus
